name: Welcome Message
message:
Welcome to {restaurant_name}, {customer_name}! 🎉

Thank you for joining our loyalty program. You've received {points_balance} bonus points as a welcome gift!

Enjoy exclusive rewards and offers.

name: Order Confirmation
message:
Hi {customer_name}! 🧾

Thank you for your order of ₹{amount}.

You've earned {points_earned} points!
Total Points: {points_balance}

See you again soon!

name: Birthday Wishes
message:
Happy Birthday {customer_name}! 🎂🎈

Wishing you a fantastic day! We've added {points_earned} bonus points to your account.

Total Points: {points_balance}

Celebrate with us!

name: Anniversary Wishes
message:
Happy Anniversary {customer_name}! 💝

Wishing you a wonderful celebration! We've added {points_earned} bonus points to your account.

Total Points: {points_balance}

Enjoy your special day!

name: Points Redeemed
message:
Hi {customer_name}! ✅

You've successfully redeemed {points_redeemed} points worth ₹{amount}.

Remaining Points: {points_balance}

Keep earning and saving!

name: Bonus Points Received
message:
Great news {customer_name}! 🌟

You've received {points_earned} bonus points!

Total Points: {points_balance}

Thank you for being a valued customer!

name: Tier Upgrade
message:
Congratulations {customer_name}! 🏆

You've been upgraded to {tier} tier!

Enjoy enhanced benefits and earn more points on every visit.

Total Points: {points_balance}

name: Points Expiring Reminder
message:
Hi {customer_name}! ⏰

Reminder: You have {points_balance} points expiring on {expiry_date}.

Visit us soon to use your points before they expire!

name: Feedback Thank You
Wallet Top-up Confirmation
message:
Hi {customer_name}! 💰

Your wallet has been topped up with ₹{amount}.

Wallet Balance: ₹{wallet_balance}

Use it on your next visit!
